metadata.title: CVE-2024-5696 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: By manipulating the text in an `<input>` tag, an attacker could havecaused corrupt memory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127 and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
